title:
Classification of monads and a new moduli component of stable rank 2
  bundles on $\mathbb{P}^3$ with even determinant and $c_2=9$
abstract:
The goal of this paper is to classify all minimal monads whose cohomology is
a stable rank 2 bundle on $\mathbb{P}^3$ with Chern classes $c_1=0$ and
$c_2=9$, with possible exception of two non-negative minimal monads, and thus
we extend the classification of the minimal monads made by Hartshorne and Rao
in \cite[Section 5.3]{HR91} when $c_2\leq8$. We also prove the existence of a
new component of the moduli space $\mathcal{B}(9)$ which is distinct from the
Hartshorne and Ein components.
